title: Carpathian Large Carnivore Project
text:
The Carpathian Large Carnivore Project (CLCP) was a project to develop and implement an extensive protection program for large carnivores (<a href="bear">bear</a>, <a href="lynx">lynx</a> and <a href="wolf">wolf</a>) in <a href="Romania">Romania</a>.
Impact.
During its term and beyond its lifetime the project caused the development of various national institutions directly or indirectly:
